name: Froggy Jammin'
description:
Mini Jam 79: Frogs

Disclaimer: It does load, it just takes long!

Protect the Concert!

You are the security guard of a concert by the Jazzy Croakers

Just as they start, they get attacked by the Flys, fend them off with your poisonous tounge!

Hear their Music!

  • Five frogs making music
  • Adaptive music depending on which frogs are there
  • Difficulty ramps up over time

Controls:

  • Movement: Wasd/ Arrow Keys
  • Tounge Aiming: Mouse
  • Tounge Attack: Right Click

Personal note:

This project was mainly focused on music, so the gameplay isn't as worked out

I hope you like it!

Special thanks to WinRaph for his support!
